nodes.text: Poliss was a male Ithorian shopkeeper on board the Herdship Bazaar specializing in droid sales and repair. Poliss was a member of the Alliance to Restore the Republic, and often recruited new members with the help of the craftsman, Jerru. He was the point of contact used by Hanos Darr and Zaz Kamiroz when they needed to relay information regarding the discovery of the Aldera Royal Palace to the Alliance.
